web_snippets: Zak Loy BIO : Zak Loy is currently the guitarist for national act Alpha Rev and the touring guitarist for Ed Kowalczyk (lead vocalist of Live).
Zak Loy, al ruim tien jaar de gitarist in de band van Ed Kowalczyk en de laatste jaren onder de naam LIVE, timmert ook aan de weg als solo-artiest! Zijn ...
Guitarist Zak Loy talks about his early bands, meeting Ed Kowalczyk and becoming Live's guitarist. He has a solo album called Dinero coming out!
